txt.en: '[placeholder]! Good cheer to you, friend! You made it, finally. Excellent. There is much work to be done.'
Mother Amma is in St√≥kkset, in south-west Clovengap.\n\nYou should talk to Mother Amma.

'Ah, [placeholder], you made it! Excellent. We certainly need your help.

'Welcome to Clovengap! Tier upon tier of overgrown wildwoods, crawling with intruders. But we shall reclaim these gardens, as is our right.

'Mother Amma has been asking after you. Talk to her first. There is much to be done and your assistance is both needed and appreciated.'

Ages ago, a great sundering shook loose the ceiling of this massive cavern. Once opened to the sky, Clovengap became an emerald swath of tiered gardens, unique among the dwarf-holds. Gone now are those gardens, replaced by dark forests and thick mists, in which prowl those with murderous intent.
